campaign.title: Influencer Program
campaign.subject: Local influencer opportunity—get paid to share what you love

slides.title: Become a Local Influencer

content.headline: Get Paid to Share Local Businesses You Love

slides.narration: Love sharing local discoveries? Have an audience that trusts your recommendations? Our local influencer program lets you get paid to share businesses you genuinely love with people who want to hear about them.

slides.title: Program Benefits

benefits.detail: Compensation for posts featuring local businesses
First to know about new businesses and events
Comped meals, services, products to review
Events with other influencers and businesses
Accept partnerships that fit your interests

slides.narration: What do local influencers receive? Paid partnerships—compensation for posts featuring local businesses. Exclusive access—first to know about new businesses and events. Free experiences—comped meals, services, and products to review. Platform growth—we feature you in our channels for cross-promotion. Community connection—events with other influencers and businesses. And a flexible schedule—accept only the partnerships that fit your interests and brand.

slides.title: Who We're Looking For

content.headline: Ideal Influencer Profile

criteria.requirement: Live and active in our community

content.note: Micro-influencers welcome—engagement matters more than follower count

slides.narration: Who are we looking for? Local presence—you live and are active in our community. Engaged following—at least five hundred followers with genuine engagement. Quality content—good photos and an authentic voice. Positive vibe—uplifting content that's supportive of local businesses. Reliable—delivers on commitments, communicates well. Note: micro-influencers are absolutely welcome. Engagement matters more than follower count.

slides.title: How It Works

process.action: Apply and get accepted into the program
Accept opportunities that fit your brand
Get paid within 7 days of posting

slides.narration: Here's how it works. Apply and get accepted into the program. Browse available partnership opportunities—restaurants, shops, services, events. Accept the ones that fit your brand and interests. Experience the business—enjoy a meal, try a service, attend an event. Create and post authentic content about your experience. Get paid within seven days of posting. Simple, flexible, genuine.

slides.title: Influencer Success

examples.quote: My audience loves discovering new local spots through me

slides.narration: What do our influencers experience? A food blogger with twenty-one hundred followers completed eight paid partnerships in three months—twelve hundred dollars plus in compensation plus all the experiences. A lifestyle creator with eight hundred fifty followers grew to twenty-four hundred through our cross-promotion—the program tripled her following. A mom blogger with thirty-five hundred followers does regular family-friendly business features. She told us: 'My audience loves discovering new local spots through me.'

slides.title: Apply Now

content.headline: Ready to Become a Local Influencer?
content.note: Applications reviewed weekly. Acceptance based on fit, not follower count.

slides.narration: Ready to become a local influencer? Apply to the program now. Applications are reviewed weekly, and acceptance is based on fit, not follower count. Or see our current influencers to see who you'd be joining. Get paid to share what you already love—local businesses that deserve attention.
